## rayPointAt variable

Inline function. Returns point on ray (`p`<!-- -->, `dir`<!-- -->) at distance `t`<!-- -->. Unless `norm` is true (default false), `dir` must be already normalized.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rayPointAt: <A extends Vec, B extends A>(p: Term<A>, dir: Term<B>, t: FloatTerm, norm?: boolean) => import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Op2<A>
```
